data.name: Tan Tock Seng Hospital Game (Tower Defense)
data.description: An innovative & fun Tower Defense game crafted for Tan Tock Seng Hospital.

data.name: Dragon Story
data.description: Dragon Story is a 2.5D side scroller RPG typed game where you progress by fighting waves of randomly procedurally generated stats monster.

data.name: Cosmic
data.description: Cosmic is an educational game that teaches you about the severity of your actions if Earth is not taken care of.

data.name: Grassroot Mobile Application
data.description: The Grassroot Application is a way to eliminate the hassle of having to document data on pieces of paper and filing them physically.

data.name: Smart Temperature Monitoring (IoT Project)
data.description: With the Smart Temperature Monitoring project, it automates temperature taking for schools, lessening the overall duration needed.

data.name: Companions
data.description: Companions is a dynamic plugin that allows server owners to create their own creative-looking Companions.

data.name: Lottery Pools (Legacy)
data.description: Lottery Pool allows you to better manage your server economy by allowing players to take in lotteries that are automatically made every (configurable) minutes.

data.name: PotionCreation (Legacy)
data.description: Allows your players to mix potions to create ONE brand new unique potion w/ unique system!

data.name: Command Regions (Legacy)
data.description: Command Regions allows you to easily execute commands/send messages when entering/leaving a region using a built-in region creator.

data.name: Doraemon Discord Bot (Legacy)
data.description: Official Discord bot for the Astero Development server! - Offers advanced ticketing system, and many more.

data.name: Fangs Discord Bot (Legacy)
data.description: A modern take on a ticketing Discord bot.

data.name: Website Inventory System (Legacy)
data.description: A dynamic inventory system on a website with advanced features.
